trans-unit.source: #112: Add IPv6 support. Patch by Dan Kruchinin.
trans-unit.target: ＃112：添加IPv6支持。Dan Kruchinin的补丁。

trans-unit.source: #115: Limit the backends we use for SLF4J during tests.
trans-unit.target: ＃115：限制在测试期间用于SLF4J的后端。

trans-unit.source: #118, #125, #128: Fix unknown variable in KazooClient command_retry argument handling.
trans-unit.target: ＃118，＃125，＃128：修复KazooClient command_retry参数处理中的未知变量。

trans-unit.source: #118: Correct session/socket timeout conversion (int vs. float).
trans-unit.target: ＃118：正确的会话/套接字超时转换（整数与浮点数）。

trans-unit.source: #121: Add a note about kazoo.recipe.queue.LockingQueue requiring a Zookeeper 3.4+ server.
trans-unit.target: ＃121：添加有关需要Zookeeper 3.4+服务器的kazoo.recipe.queue.LockingQueue的注释。

trans-unit.source: #126: Fix KazooRetry.copy to correctly copy sleep function.
trans-unit.target: ＃126：修复KazooRetry.copy以正确复制睡眠功能。

trans-unit.source: #144, #221: Let client.command work with IPv6 addresses.
trans-unit.target: ＃144，＃221：让client.command使用IPv6地址。

trans-unit.source: #216: Fixed timeout for ConnectionHandler._invoke.
trans-unit.target: ＃216：修复了ConnectionHandler._invoke的超时问题。

trans-unit.source: #222: Document that committed on the transaction is used to ensure only one commit and is not an indicator of whether operations in the transaction returned desired results.
trans-unit.target: ＃222：在事务上提交的文档仅用于确保一次提交，而不能指示事务中的操作是否返回了预期的结果。

trans-unit.source: #261: Creating a sequential znode under / doesn't work.
trans-unit.target: ＃261：在/下创建顺序znode无效。

trans-unit.source: #271: Fixed handling of KazooState.SUSPENDED in SetPartitioner.
trans-unit.target: ＃271：修复了SetPartitioner中KazooState.SUSPENDED的处理。

trans-unit.source: #274: Add server_version() retries (by default 4 attempts will be made) to better handle flakey responses.
trans-unit.target: ＃274：添加server_version（）重试（默认情况下将进行4次尝试）以更好地处理Flakey响应。

trans-unit.source: #283: Fixed a race condition in SetPartitioner when party changes during handling of lock acquisition.
trans-unit.target: ＃283：修复了在获取锁过程中当事方更改时SetPartitioner中的竞争条件。

trans-unit.source: #291: Kazoo lock recipe was only partially re-entrant in that multiple calls to acquire would obtain the the lock but the first call to release would remove the underlying lock. This would leave the X - 1 other acquire statements unprotected (and no longer holding there expected lock). To fix this the comment about that lock recipe being re-entrant has been removed and multiple acquires will now block when attempted.
trans-unit.target: ＃291：Kazoo锁定配方只是部分重入，因为多次获取调用将获得该锁定，但是第一个释放调用将删除基础锁定。这将使其他X-1个Acquisition语句不受保护（并且不再在那里保留预期的锁定）。为了解决这个问题，已删除有关重新进入锁配方的注释，并且现在尝试进行多次获取时，都将阻止它。

trans-unit.source: #303: don't crash on random input as the hosts string.
trans-unit.target: ＃303：当主机字符串输入时，不要在随机输入时崩溃。

trans-unit.source: #315: multiple acquires of a kazoo lock using the lock recipe would block when using acquire even when non-blocking is specified (only when the lock was/has been already acquired).
trans-unit.target: ＃315：使用锁配方多次获取kazoo锁时，即使指定了非阻塞（仅当已经/已经获取锁时），使用获取时也会阻塞。

trans-unit.source: #318: At exit register takes *args and **kwargs not args and kargs
trans-unit.target: ＃318：在退出寄存器中接受 *args 和 **kwargs 而不是args和kargs

trans-unit.source: #372: fully resolve multiple records for hosts in the zookeeper connection string
trans-unit.target: ＃372：完全解析Zookeeper连接字符串中主机的多个记录

trans-unit.source: #78: Kazoo now uses socketpairs instead of pipes making it compatible with Windows.
trans-unit.target: ＃78：Kazoo现在使用套接字对而不是管道，从而使其与Windows兼容。

trans-unit.source: '"is" with a literal' syntax errors (#609) (6b6ffe62)
trans-unit.target: '“ is”有文字'语法错误（＃609）（6b6ffe62）

trans-unit.source: kazoo implements a higher level API to Apache Zookeeper for Python clients.
trans-unit.target: kazoo 为Python客户端的Apache Zookeeper实现了更高级别的API 。

trans-unit.source: kazoo is offered under the Apache License 2.0.
trans-unit.target: kazoo 是根据Apache License 2.0提供的。

trans-unit.source: kazoo started under the Nimbus Project and through collaboration with the open-source community has been merged with code from Mozilla and the Zope Corporation. It has since gathered an active community of over fifty contributors.
trans-unit.target: kazoo 在Nimbus项目下启动，并通过与开源社区的合作已与Mozilla和Zope Corporation的代码合并 。此后，它聚集了一个由五十多个贡献者组成的活跃社区。

trans-unit.source: WARNING: THIS IS THE LAST KAZOO RELEASE THAT SUPPORTS PYTHON 2.6. ALL FUTURE VERSIONS WILL REQUIRE PYTHON 2.7 AND ABOVE.
trans-unit.target: 警告：这是支持PYTHON 2.6的最新KAZOO版本。所有未来版本都需要Python 2.7及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: CI: Keep only Python 3.{6,7} to CI and bump ZK versions to latests (#574) (c293aabf)
trans-unit.target: CI： 仅将Python 3. {6,7}保留为CI，并将ZK版本保留为最新版本（＃574）（c293aabf）

trans-unit.source: CI: deploying only for 1 job (0ba3634d)
trans-unit.target: CI： 仅部署一项作业（0ba3634d）

trans-unit.source: PYTHON SUPPORTED VERSIONS CHANGE: Please note that Kazoo no longer tests on Python 2.6 or 3.3. Tested versions are 2.7, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6, and PyPy. The multiple endpoint support for KazooClient may not work correctly on 2.6.
trans-unit.target: PYTHON支持的版本更改：请注意，Kazoo不再在Python 2.6或3.3上进行测试。测试版本为2.7、3.4、3.5、3.6和PyPy。KazooClient的多端点支持在2.6上可能无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: chore: using Github templates for issues and PRs (#610) (eddc0976)
trans-unit.target: 琐事： 使用Github模板进行问题和PR（＃610）（eddc0976）

trans-unit.source: client: add missing paren (#550) (1452a48f)
trans-unit.target: 客户端： 添加缺少的括号（＃550）（1452a48f）

trans-unit.source: core:
trans-unit.target: 核心：

trans-unit.source: core: Update matrix: add pypy3, drop py27 (522189da)
trans-unit.target: 核心： 更新矩阵：添加pypy3，删除py27（522189da）

trans-unit.source: core: Use chain.from_iterable in threading.py (#614) (13c73ec5)
trans-unit.target: 核心： 在threading.py（＃614）（13c73ec5）中使用chain.from_iterable

trans-unit.source: core: fix broken zookeeper programmers guide link (8ecf8a50)
trans-unit.target: 核心： 修复损坏的Zookeeper程序员指南链接（8ecf8a50）

trans-unit.source: core: revert PR #305 SetWatches which caused RuntimeError (a7b45390)
trans-unit.target: 核心： 还原导致RuntimeError的PR＃305 SetWatches（a7b45390）

trans-unit.source: handlers: make AsyncResult call all registered callbacks instantly if the handler has stopped running (#549) (d9e0e720)
trans-unit.target: 处理程序： 如果处理程序已停止运行，则使AsyncResult立即调用所有已注册的回调（＃549）（d9e0e720）

trans-unit.source: recipe:
trans-unit.target: 食谱：

trans-unit.source: recipe: Add TreeCache recipe (ec8b337e)
trans-unit.target: 配方： 添加TreeCache配方（ec8b337e）

trans-unit.source: recipe: Delete lock node in queue recipe if entry already consumed (7a8167de)
trans-unit.target: 配方： 如果条目已被使用，则删除队列配方中的锁定节点（7a8167de）

trans-unit.source: recipe: Give TreeCache standalone queue (4456f180)
trans-unit.target: 配方： 给TreeCache独立队列（4456f180）

trans-unit.source: recipe: add support for curator SharedCount recipe (#559) (88b657a0, closes #558)
trans-unit.target: 配方： 添加对策展人SharedCount配方（＃559）的支持（88b657a0，关闭＃558）

trans-unit.source: recipe: allow non ephemeral locking (6f7a603d)
trans-unit.target: 配方： 允许非临时锁定（6f7a603d）

trans-unit.source: recipe: crash if None in znode (#569) (ded79467)
trans-unit.target: 配方： 如果znode中没有None（＃569）（ded79467），则崩溃

trans-unit.source: tests:
trans-unit.target: 测试：

trans-unit.source: tests: Add coverage report on codecov.io (bb475843)
trans-unit.target: 测试： 在codecov.io上添加覆盖率报告（bb475843）

trans-unit.source: utils: extend create_tcp_connection utility (#568) (ab0cd00c)
trans-unit.target: utils： 扩展create_tcp_connection实用程序（＃568）（ab0cd00c）

trans-unit.source: API Changes
trans-unit.target: API变化

trans-unit.source: Add state_change_event to kazoo.recipe.partitioner.SetPartitioner which is set on every state change.
trans-unit.target: 将 state_change_event 添加到 每次状态更改时设置的 kazoo.recipe.partitioner.SetPartitioner 。

trans-unit.source: Add a NonBlockingLease recipe. The recipe allows e.g. cron jobs scheduled on multiple machines to ensure that at most N instances will run a particular job, with lease timeout for graceful handover in case of node failures.
trans-unit.target: 增加一个NonBlockingLease配方。该配方允许例如在多台机器上调度cron作业,以确保最多N个实例将运行一个特定的作业,在节点故障的情况下,租期超时以实现优雅的交接。

trans-unit.source: Add a max_leases consistency check to the semaphore recipe.
trans-unit.target: 在semaphore配方中加入max_leases一致性检查。

trans-unit.source: Add a new retry_max_delay argument to the client and by default limit the retry delay to at most an hour regardless of exponential backoff settings.
trans-unit.target: 为客户端增加一个新的retry_max_delay参数,默认情况下,无论指数型后退设置如何,都将重试延迟限制为最多一个小时。

trans-unit.source: Add create2 support (1d81f96a)
trans-unit.target: 添加create2支持（1d81f96a）

trans-unit.source: Add license to Wheel (43d156de)
trans-unit.target: 向Wheel添加许可（43d156de）

trans-unit.source: Add new Counter recipe.
trans-unit.target: 添加新的计数器配方。

trans-unit.source: Add new Queue recipe, with optional priority support.
trans-unit.target: 增加新的队列配方,可选择支持优先级。

trans-unit.source: Add new Semaphore recipe.
trans-unit.target: 添加新的Semaphore配方。

trans-unit.source: Add new randomize_hosts argument to KazooClient, allowing one to disable host randomization.
trans-unit.target: 在KazooClient中加入新的随机化主机参数,允许禁用主机随机化。

trans-unit.source: Add note about alternate use of DataWatch.
trans-unit.target: 增加关于DataWatch其他用途的说明。

trans-unit.source: Add section on contributing recipes, add maintainer/status information for existing recipes.
trans-unit.target: 增加关于贡献食谱的部分,增加现有食谱的维护者/状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Add support for Python 3.2, 3.3 and PyPy (only for the threading handler).
trans-unit.target: 增加对Python 3.2、3.3和PyPy的支持(仅支持线程处理程序)。

trans-unit.source: Added 'include_data' option for get_children to include the node's Stat object.
trans-unit.target: 为get_children添加了'include_data'选项,以包含节点的Stat对象。

trans-unit.source: Added Barrier and DoubleBarrier implementation.
trans-unit.target: 增加了Barrier和DoubleBarrier的实现。

trans-unit.source: Added SSL support (#513) (35ce1066)
trans-unit.target: 添加了SSL支持（＃513）（35ce1066）

trans-unit.source: Added a LockingQueue recipe. The queue first locks an item and removes it from the queue only after the consume() method is called. This enables other nodes to retake the item if an error occurs on the first node.
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个LockingQueue配方。该队列首先锁定一个项目,并在调用 consume()方法后才将其从队列中移除。这样,如果第一个节点发生错误,其他节点就可以重新获取该项目。

trans-unit.source: Added debian packaging rules.
trans-unit.target: 添加了debian打包规则。

trans-unit.source: All future commits must abide by the new CONTRIBUTING.md document describing how to label commits so they can be automatically used to automatically generate an accurate changelog.
trans-unit.target: 所有未来的提交都必须遵守新的 CONTRIBUTING.md 文档,该文档描述了如何给提交打上标签,以便它们可以自动用于自动生成准确的变更日志。

trans-unit.source: Another fix for atexit handling so that when disposing of connections the atexit handler is removed. PR #190, patch by Devaev Maxim.
trans-unit.target: 对 atexit 处理的另一个修正,以便在处理连接时,删除 atexit 处理程序。PR #190,Devaev Maxim 的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Authors
trans-unit.target: 作者

trans-unit.source: Automatic background scanning for a Read/Write server when connected to a server in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 当连接到只读模式的服务器时,自动对读/写服务器进行后台扫描。

trans-unit.source: Backwards compatible exception class aliases are provided for now in kazoo exceptions for the prior C exception names.
trans-unit.target: 目前在kazoo异常中为之前的C异常名提供了向后兼容的异常类别名。

trans-unit.source: Base client library with handler support for threading and gevent async environments.
trans-unit.target: 基础客户端库,支持线程和gevent异步环境的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Bug Fixes
trans-unit.target: 错误修复

trans-unit.source: Bug Handling
trans-unit.target: 错误处理

trans-unit.source: Calling a DataWatch or ChildrenWatch instance twice (decorator) now throws an exception as only a single function can be associated with a single watcher. Issue #154.
trans-unit.target: 两次调用DataWatch或ChildrenWatch实例(装饰器)现在会抛出异常,因为一个函数只能与一个观察者关联。问题#154.

trans-unit.source: Change gevent import to remove deprecation warning when newer gevent is used. PR #191, patch by Hiroaki Kawai.
trans-unit.target: 修改 gevent 导入,删除使用新的 gevent 时的废弃警告。PR #191,河井宏明的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Changes being made now to ensure more accuracy in the changelog will appear in all future versions going forward. Read the commit history for a better understanding of changes merged between 2.2.1 and 2.3.0.
trans-unit.target: 现在所做的改动是为了确保变更日志的准确性,这些改动将出现在未来的所有版本中。请阅读提交历史,以便更好地了解 2.2.1 和 2.3.0 之间合并的变化。

trans-unit.source: Chore
trans-unit.target: 舞蹈

trans-unit.source: Correctly document supported versions (f860de52)
trans-unit.target: 正确记录受支持的版本（f860de52）

trans-unit.source: Correctly fire multiple callbacks (0905c47b)
trans-unit.target: 正确触发多个回调（0905c47b）

trans-unit.source: Data and Children watching API's.
trans-unit.target: 数据和儿童观看API的。

trans-unit.source: Data-watchers for the same node are no longer 'stacked'. That is, if a get and an exists call occur for the same node with the same watch function, then it will be registered only once. This change results in Kazoo behaving per Zookeeper client spec regarding repeat watch use.
trans-unit.target: 同一节点的数据监视函数不再 "堆叠"。也就是说,如果同一个节点的数据监视函数发生了get和existence调用,那么它将只被注册一次。这个变化导致Kazoo的行为符合Zookeeper客户端关于重复使用手表的规范。

trans-unit.source: DataWatch no longer takes any parameters besides for the optional function during instantiation. The additional options are now implicitly True, with the user being left to ignore events as they choose. See the DataWatch API docs for more information.
trans-unit.target: DataWatch在实例化过程中,除了可选的函数外,不再接受任何参数。附加选项现在是隐式的True,用户可以选择忽略事件。更多信息请参见 DataWatch API 文档。

trans-unit.source: DataWatch now has a allow_missing_node setting that allows a watch to be set on a node that doesn't exist when the DataWatch is created.
trans-unit.target: DataWatch现在有一个allow_missing_node设置,允许在创建DataWatch时不存在的节点上设置手表。

trans-unit.source: Deprecations
trans-unit.target: 弃用

trans-unit.source: Disable JAAS isInitiator for Server (933b38b5)
trans-unit.target: 禁用服务器的JAAS isInitiator（933b38b5）

trans-unit.source: Disable problematic hound-flake8-black integration. (75f62a0d)
trans-unit.target: 禁用有问题的hound-flake8-black集成。（75f62a0d）

trans-unit.source: Doc
trans-unit.target: 文件

trans-unit.source: Docs have been restructured to handle the new classes and locations of the methods from the pure Python refactor.
trans-unit.target: 文档进行了调整,以处理纯 Python 重构后的新类和方法的位置。

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: 文件资料

trans-unit.source: Exponential backoff with jitter for retrying commands.
trans-unit.target: 带抖动的指数后退,用于重试命令。

trans-unit.source: Extend support to Python 3.4, deprecating Python 3.2.
trans-unit.target: 扩展对Python 3.4的支持,废弃Python 3.2。

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 特点

trans-unit.source: Fix PatientChildrenWatch to use handler specific sleep function.
trans-unit.target: 修正PatientChildrenWatch使用处理程序特定的睡眠功能。

trans-unit.source: Fix atexit handling for kazoo threading handler, PR #183. Patch by Brian Wickman.
trans-unit.target: 修正 kazoo 线程处理程序的 atexit 处理,PR #183。由 Brian Wickman 编写的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug with gevent 0.13.x backport of peekable queue.
trans-unit.target: 修正 gevent 0.13.x 回溯 peekable 队列的 bug。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug with locks not handling intermediary lock contenders disappearing.
trans-unit.target: 修复锁不处理中间锁竞争者消失的bug。

trans-unit.source: Fix bug with set_data type check failing to catch unicode values.
trans-unit.target: 修复了set_data类型检查无法捕获unicode值的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fix gevent 1.3b1+ timeout import (257b5896)
trans-unit.target: 修复gevent 1.3b1 +超时导入（257b5896）

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with client.stop() not always setting the client state to KeeperState.CLOSED. Patch by Jyrki Pulliainen in PR #174.
trans-unit.target: 修正client.stop()不总是将客户端状态设置为KeeperState.CLOSED的问题。由Jyrki Pulliainen在PR #174中提供的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Fix ordering of exception catches in lock.acquire as it was capturing a parent exception before the child. Patch by ReneSac.
trans-unit.target: 修正 lock.acquisition 中异常捕获的顺序,因为它在子异常之前捕获了一个父异常。ReneSac 提供的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Fix the recipe examples, so they actually work by connecting to ZooKeeper. Without start() they just hang and can't be killed.
trans-unit.target: 修正配方的例子,让它们通过连接到ZooKeeper来实际工作。如果没有start(),它们就会挂起,无法被杀死。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug similar to #14 for ChildrenWatch on the session listener.
trans-unit.target: 修正了会话监听器上类似#14的ChildrenWatch错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug with client reconnection looping indefinitely using an expired session id.
trans-unit.target: 修正了使用过期会话ID无限期循环客户端重新连接的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed doc references to start_async using an AsyncResult object, it uses an Event object.
trans-unit.target: 修正了文档中对start_async使用AsyncResult对象的引用,它使用的是Event对象。

trans-unit.source: Fixed password bug with updated zc-zookeeper-static release, which retains null bytes in the password properly.
trans-unit.target: 修正了更新后的zc-zookeeper-static版本中的密码bug,它能正确保留密码中的空字节。

trans-unit.source: Fixed possible bug with using a threading.Condition in the set partitioner. Set partitioner uses new rlock_object handler API to get an appropriate RLock for gevent.
trans-unit.target: 修正了在set partitioner中使用threading.Condition时可能出现的错误。设置分区器使用新的rlock_object handler API来为gevent获取合适的RLock。

trans-unit.source: Fixed reconnect hammering, so that the reconnection follows retry jitter and retry backoff's.
trans-unit.target: 修正了重连锤击,使重连遵循重试抖动和重试后退的。

trans-unit.source: Gevent 0.13 and 1.0b support.
trans-unit.target: 支持Gevent 0.13和1.0b。

trans-unit.source: Handler interface now has an rlock_object for use by recipes.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序接口现在有一个rlock_object供配方使用。

trans-unit.source: Handles connecting to Zookeeper 3.4+ read-only servers.
trans-unit.target: 处理连接到Zookeeper 3.4+只读服务器。

trans-unit.source: Higher Level Zookeeper Client
trans-unit.target: 高级动物园管理员客户

trans-unit.source: Implement proper retry backoff logic with jitter. (0bb0659c)
trans-unit.target: 实施具有抖动的适当重试退避逻辑。（0bb0659c）

trans-unit.source: Improvements to Debian packaging rules.
trans-unit.target: 对 Debian 包装规则的改进。

trans-unit.source: Integrate eventlet handler support into kazoo so that along with [gevent, threading] handlers there can now be a dedicated eventlet handler for projects that need to (or want to) use eventlet (such as those working in the openstack community). The requirements_eventlet.txt file lists the optional eventlet requirement(s) that needs to be satisfied when this new handler is used.
trans-unit.target: 将eventlet处理程序支持集成到kazoo中，以便与[gevent，threading]处理程序一起，现在可以为需要（或想要）使用eventlet的项目（例如在openstack社区中工作的项目）提供专用的eventlet处理程序。该 requirements_eventlet.txt 文件列出了可选eventlet要求（S），在使用这种新的处理程序，以满足需求。

trans-unit.source: Issue #100: Make it easier to see exception context in threading and connection modules.
trans-unit.target: 问题100:在线程和连接模块中更容易看到异常上下文。

trans-unit.source: Issue #103: Allow prefix-less sequential znodes.
trans-unit.target: 问题#103:允许无前缀顺序的znodes。

trans-unit.source: Issue #105: Avoid rare import lock problems by moving module imports in client.py to the module scope.
trans-unit.target: 问题#105:通过将client.py中的模块导入移至模块范围来避免罕见的导入锁问题。

trans-unit.source: Issue #106, #107: client.create_async didn't strip change root from the returned path.
trans-unit.target: 问题#106、#107:client.create_async没有从返回的路径中剥离出change root。

trans-unit.source: Issue #108: Circular import fail when importing kazoo.recipe.watchers directly has now been resolved. Watchers and partitioner properly import the KazooState from kazoo.protocol.states rather than kazoo.client.
trans-unit.target: 问题#108:直接导入kazoo.recipe.watchers时的循环导入失败,现已解决。Watchers和partitioner正确地从kazoo.protocol.states而不是kazoo.client导入KazooState。

trans-unit.source: Issue #109: Partials not usable properly as a datawatch call can now be used. All funcs will be called with 3 args and fall back to 2 args if there's an argument error.
trans-unit.target: 问题#109:Partials不能正常使用的数据观察调用现在可以使用了。所有的funcs将被调用3个args,如果有一个参数错误,将退回到2个args。

trans-unit.source: Issue #119: Handler timeout takes the max of the random interval or the read timeout to ensure a negative number isn't used for the read timeout.
trans-unit.target: 问题#119:处理程序超时取随机间隔或读取超时的最大值,以确保读取超时不使用负数。

trans-unit.source: Issue #12 fixed: gevent 0.13 doesn't use the same start_new_thread as gevent 1.0 which resulted in a fully monkey-patched environment halting due to the wrong thread. Updated to use the older kazoo method of getting the real thread module object.
trans-unit.target: 问题#12修复:gevent 0.13没有使用与gevent 1.0相同的start_new_thread,导致完全猴子补丁的环境因错误的线程而停止。更新为使用旧的kazoo方法获取真正的线程模块对象。

trans-unit.source: Issue #133: Introduce a new environment variable ZOOKEEPER_PORT_OFFSET for the testing support, to run the testing cluster on a different range.
trans-unit.target: 问题133:为测试支持引入一个新的环境变量ZOOKEEPER_PORT_OFFSET,以在不同的范围内运行测试集群。

trans-unit.source: Issue #14 fixed: DataWatch had inconsistent handling of the node it was watching not existing. DataWatch also properly spawns its _get_data function to avoid blocking session events.
trans-unit.target: 修正了问题#14。DataWatch对被监视节点不存在的处理不一致。DataWatch也正确地生成了它的_get_data函数以避免阻塞会话事件。

trans-unit.source: Issue #15 fixed again: Force sleep delay to be a float to appease gevent.
trans-unit.target: 问题#15再次修复。强制将睡眠延迟改为浮动,以满足Gevent的要求。

trans-unit.source: Issue #15 fixed: sleep_func for SequentialGeventHandler was not set on the class appropriately leading to additional arguments being passed to gevent.sleep.
trans-unit.target: 问题#15修正:SequentialGeventHandler的sleep_func没有在类上适当设置,导致额外的参数被传递给gevent.sleep。

trans-unit.source: Issue #16 fixed: gevent zookeeper logging failed to handle a monkey patched logging setup. Logging is now setup such that a greenlet is used for logging messages under gevent, and the thread one is used otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 问题#16修正:gevent zookeeper日志未能处理猴子补丁的日志设置。现在,日志设置为在 gevent 下使用 greenlet 记录消息,否则使用线程。

trans-unit.source: Issue #167: Closing a client that was never started throws a type error. Patch by Joshua Harlow.
trans-unit.target: 问题#167:关闭一个从未启动的客户端会引发类型错误。由 Joshua Harlow 提供的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Issue #169: Fixed pipes leaking into child processes.
trans-unit.target: 问题#169:修正了漏入子进程的管道

trans-unit.source: Issue #17 fixed: Wrap timeout exceptions with staticmethod so they can be used directly as intended. Patch by Bob Van Zant.
trans-unit.target: 问题#17修复。用 staticmethod 包裹超时异常,这样就可以直接使用。补丁作者:Bob Van Zant。

trans-unit.source: Issue #181: Add documentation on basic logging setup.
trans-unit.target: 问题#181:增加基本日志设置的文档。

trans-unit.source: Issue #198: Mention Zake as a sophisticated kazoo mock testing library.
trans-unit.target: 第198期。提到Zake是一个复杂的Kazoo模拟测试库。

trans-unit.source: Issue #234: Add support for reconfig cluster membership operation
trans-unit.target: 问题#234:增加对重新配置集群成员操作的支持

trans-unit.source: Issue #29 fixed: DataWatch and ChildrenWatch properly re-register their watches on server disconnect.
trans-unit.target: 修正问题#29。DataWatch和ChildrenWatch在服务器断开时正确地重新注册他们的手表。

trans-unit.source: Issue #31 fixed: Only catch KazooExceptions in catch-all calls.
trans-unit.target: 问题#31修正。只在 catch-all 调用中捕获 KazooExceptions。

trans-unit.source: Issue #34: Be more careful while handling socket connection errors.
trans-unit.target: 问题34:在处理socket连接错误时要更加小心。

trans-unit.source: Issue #35: KazooClient.__init__ didn't pass on retry_max_delay to the retry helper.
trans-unit.target: 问题35:KazooClient.__init__没有将retry_max_delay传递给重试助手。

trans-unit.source: Issue #36: Correctly set ConnectionHandler.writer_stopped even if an exception is raised inside the writer, like a retry operation failing.
trans-unit.target: 问题36:正确设置ConnectionHandler.writer_stopped,即使在writer内部出现异常,比如重试操作失败。

trans-unit.source: Issue #37 / #40: Handle timeout errors during select calls on sockets.
trans-unit.target: 问题#37/#40:处理套接字上选择调用时的超时错误。

trans-unit.source: Issue #38: Set CLOEXEC flag on all sockets when available.
trans-unit.target: 问题38:在所有插座上设置CLOEXEC标志。

trans-unit.source: Issue #39 / #41: Handle connection dropped errors during session writes. Ensure client connection is re-established to a new ZK node if available.
trans-unit.target: 问题#39/#41:处理会话写入期间的连接掉线错误。确保客户端连接重新建立到一个新的ZK节点(如果可用)。

trans-unit.source: Issue #43: Let DataWatch return node data if allow_missing_node is used.
trans-unit.target: 问题43:如果使用allow_missing_node,让DataWatch返回节点数据。

trans-unit.source: Issue #46: Avoid TypeError in GeneratorContextManager on process shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 问题#46:在进程关闭时避免GeneratorContextManager的TypeError。

trans-unit.source: Issue #48: Added documentation for the retry helper module.
trans-unit.target: 问题#48:添加了重试助手模块的文档。

trans-unit.source: Issue #50: Avoid problems with sleep function in mixed gevent/threading setup.
trans-unit.target: 问题50:在混合gevent/线程设置中避免睡眠功能的问题。

trans-unit.source: Issue #53: Throw a warning upon starting if the chroot path doesn't exist so that it's more obvious when the chroot should be created before performing more operations.
trans-unit.target: 问题53:如果chroot路径不存在,在启动时发出警告,以便在执行更多操作之前,更明显地知道何时应该创建chroot。

trans-unit.source: Issue #55: Fix os.pipe file descriptor leak and introduce a KazooClient.close method. The method is particular useful in tests, where multiple KazooClients are created and closed in the same process.
trans-unit.target: 问题 55:修复 os.pipe 文件描述符泄漏,并引入 KazooClient.close 方法。该方法在测试中特别有用,因为在同一个过程中会创建和关闭多个KazooClients。

trans-unit.source: Issue #56: Avoid issues with watch callbacks evaluating to false.
trans-unit.target: 问题56:避免观察回调评估为false的问题。

trans-unit.source: Issue #58: DataWatcher failed to re-register for changes after non-existent node was created then deleted.
trans-unit.target: 问题58:DataWatcher在创建不存在的节点后,未能重新注册更改,然后删除。

trans-unit.source: Issue #62, #92, #89, #101, #102: Allow KazooRetry to have a max deadline, transition properly when connection fails to LOST, and setup separate connection retry behavior from client command retry behavior. Patches by Mike Lundy.
trans-unit.target: 问题#62、#92、#89、#101、#102:允许KazooRetry有一个最大的截止日期,当连接失败到LOST时正确过渡,并设置独立的连接重试行为和客户端命令重试行为。补丁作者:Mike Lundy。

trans-unit.source: Issue #63: Watchers weren't reset on lost connection.
trans-unit.target: 问题#63:守望者在失去连接时没有被重置。

trans-unit.source: Issue #65: Allow non-blocking semaphore acquisition.
trans-unit.target: 问题#65:允许非阻塞的旗语获取

trans-unit.source: Issue #66: Require ping reply before sending another ping, otherwise the connection will be considered dead and a ConnectionDropped will be raised to trigger a reconnect.
trans-unit.target: 问题#66:要求在发送另一个ping之前先回复ping,否则连接将被认为是死的,ConnectionDropped将被触发重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Issue #68: Closing the connection causes exceptions to be raised by watchers which assume the connection won't be closed when running commands.
trans-unit.target: 问题#68:关闭连接会导致观察者产生异常,因为观察者认为运行命令时不会关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: Issue #69: Only ensure path once in lock and semaphore recipes.
trans-unit.target: 问题#69:在锁和旗语配方中只确保路径一次。

trans-unit.source: Issue #76: Extend testing helpers to allow customization of the Java classpath by specifying the new ZOOKEEPER_CLASSPATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 问题#76:扩展测试助手,通过指定新的ZOOKEEPER_CLASSPATH环境变量,允许自定义Java classpath。

trans-unit.source: Issue #77: Use timeout in initial socket connection.
trans-unit.target: 问题#77:在初始插座连接中使用超时。

trans-unit.source: Issue #79 / #90: Add ability to pass the WatchedEvent to DataWatch and ChildWatch functions.
trans-unit.target: 问题#79/#90。增加将WatchedEvent传递给DataWatch和ChildWatch函数的功能。

trans-unit.source: Issue #85: Increase information density of logs and don't prevent dynamic reconfiguration of log levels at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 问题85:提高日志的信息密度,不要在运行时阻止日志级别的动态重新配置。

trans-unit.source: Issue #87 / #88: Allow re-acquiring lock after cancel.
trans-unit.target: 问题#87/#88:允许取消后重新获得锁定。

trans-unit.source: Issue #9 fixed: Threads/greenlets didn't gracefully shut down. Handler now has a start/stop that is used by the client when calling start and stop that shuts down the handler workers. This addresses errors and warnings that could be emitted upon process shutdown regarding a clean exit of the workers.
trans-unit.target: 问题#9修正:线程/greenlets没有优雅地关闭。处理程序现在有一个start/stop,客户端在调用start和stop关闭处理程序工作者时使用。这解决了在进程关闭时可能会发出的关于干净退出工作者的错误和警告。

trans-unit.source: Issue #93: Add timeout option to lock/semaphore acquire methods.
trans-unit.target: 问题#93:在锁/旗杆获取方法中增加超时选项。

trans-unit.source: Issue #94: Clean up stray bytes in connection pipe.
trans-unit.target: 问题#94:清理连接管道中的杂散字节。

trans-unit.source: Issue #95: Handle errors deserializing connection response.
trans-unit.target: 问题#95:处理连接响应反序列化的错误。

trans-unit.source: Issue #96: Provide Windows compatibility in testing harness.
trans-unit.target: 问题#96:在测试线束中提供Windows兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Issue #97: Update some docstrings to reflect current state of handlers.
trans-unit.target: 问题#97。更新一些docstrings以反映当前处理程序的状态。

trans-unit.source: Issue #98: Extend testing ZK harness to work with different file locations on some versions of Debian/Ubuntu.
trans-unit.target: 问题#98:扩展测试ZK harness,使其能在某些版本的Debian/Ubuntu上的不同文件位置工作。

trans-unit.source: Issue #99: Better exception raised when the writer fails to close. A WriterNotClosedException that inherits from KazooException is now raised when the writer fails to close in time.
trans-unit.target: 问题#99:当写入器未能关闭时,更好的引发异常。继承自KazooException的WriterNotClosedException现在会在写入者未能及时关闭时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Kazoo
trans-unit.target: Kazoo

trans-unit.source: Kazoo previously would let the same function be registered as a data-watch or child-watch multiple times, and then call it multiple times upon being triggered. This was non-compliant Zookeeper client behavior, the same watch can now only be registered once for the same znode path per Zookeeper client documentation.
trans-unit.target: Kazoo以前会让同一个函数多次注册为数据手表或子手表,然后在被触发时多次调用它,这是不符合Zookeeper客户端的行为,现在根据Zookeeper客户端文档,同一个手表只能注册一次。这是不符合Zookeeper客户端的行为,现在根据Zookeeper客户端文档,同一个手表只能为同一个znode路径注册一次。

trans-unit.source: KazooClient can now be stopped more reliably even if its in the middle of a long retry sleep. This utilizes the new interrupt feature of KazooRetry which lets the sleep be broken down into chunks and an interrupt function called to determine if the retry should fail early.
trans-unit.target: KazooClient现在可以更可靠地停止重试,即使是在长时间的重试睡眠中。这利用了KazooRetry新的中断功能,让睡眠被分解成块,并调用一个中断函数来决定重试是否应该提前失败。

trans-unit.source: KazooClient.create_async now supports the makepath argument.
trans-unit.target: KazooClient.create_async现在支持makepath参数。

trans-unit.source: KazooClient.ensure_path now has an async version, ensure_path_async.
trans-unit.target: KazooClient.esure_path现在有一个异步版本,esure_path_async。

trans-unit.source: License
trans-unit.target: 许可证

trans-unit.source: Lock recipe was failing to use the client's sleep_func causing issues with gevent. Issue #150.
trans-unit.target: 锁定配方无法使用客户端的sleep_func,导致gevent的问题。问题#150。

trans-unit.source: Lock, Party, SetPartitioner, and Election recipe implementations.
trans-unit.target: Lock、Party、SetPartitioner和Election配方的实现。

trans-unit.source: Logging levels have been reduced.
trans-unit.target: 伐木水平已经降低。

trans-unit.source: Logging previously at the logging.DEBUG level is now logged at the kazoo.loggingsupport.BLATHER level (5).
trans-unit.target: 以前以 logging.DEBUG 级别记录的日志现在以 kazoo.loggingsupport.BLATHER 级别记录（5）。

trans-unit.source: Move to pytest (de97d74b)
trans-unit.target: 移至pytest（de97d74b）

trans-unit.source: New KeeperState.CONNECTED_RO state for Zookeeper servers connected in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 新增KeeperState.CONNECTED_RO状态,用于Zookeeper服务器以只读模式连接。

trans-unit.source: New NotReadOnlyCallError exception when issuing a write change against a server thats currently read-only.
trans-unit.target: 新增NotReadOnlyCallError异常,当对当前只读的服务器发出写变更时。

trans-unit.source: New client.command and client.server_version API, exposing Zookeeper's four letter commands and giving access to structured version information.
trans-unit.target: 新的client.command和client.server_version API,公开了Zookeeper的四个字母命令,并提供了对结构化版本信息的访问。

trans-unit.source: No more memory leak once TreeCache was closed (#524) (c48f2733)
trans-unit.target: 关闭TreeCache后不再发生内存泄漏（＃524）（c48f2733）

trans-unit.source: No more memory leak when ChildrenWatch was stopped (#543) (37bcda35)
trans-unit.target: 停止ChildrenWatch时不再发生内存泄漏（＃543）（37bcda35）

trans-unit.source: Node paths are assumed to be Unicode objects. Under Python 2 pure-ascii strings will also be accepted. Node values are considered bytes. The byte type is an alias for str under Python 2.
trans-unit.target: 节点路径被认为是 Unicode 对象。在Python 2中,也可以接受纯ascii字符串。节点值被认为是字节。字节类型是 Python 2 下 str 的别名。

trans-unit.source: Null or None data is no longer treated as "". Pull req #165, patch by Raul Gutierrez S. This will affect how you should treat null data in a znode vs. an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Null或None数据不再被视为""。Pull req #165,由 Raul Gutierrez S 打的补丁。这将影响你如何处理 znode 中的 null 数据与空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Partitioner should handle a suspended connection properly and restore an allocated state if it was allocated previously. Patch by Manish Tomar.
trans-unit.target: Partitioner 应该正确处理暂停的连接,并在之前分配的情况下恢复已分配的状态。由 Manish Tomar 提供的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Pass watch as keyword arg instead of positional arg (#495) (23850792)
trans-unit.target: 将watch作为关键字arg而不是位置arg（＃495）（23850792）

trans-unit.source: Passing acl=[] to create() now works properly instead of an InvalidACLError as it returned before. Patch by Raul Gutierrez S in PR #164.
trans-unit.target: 传递acl=[]到create()现在可以正常工作,而不是像之前那样返回InvalidACLError。由Raul Gutierrez S在PR #164中提供的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Passing dictionaries to KazooClient.__init__() wasn't actually working properly. Patch by Ryan Uber.
trans-unit.target: 传递字典到 KazooClient.__init__()实际上没有正常工作。Ryan Uber 补丁。

trans-unit.source: Password mangling due to the C lib is gone.
trans-unit.target: 由于C语言库导致的密码乱码已经消失了。

trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: 绩效

trans-unit.source: Please note, there have been a few dozen merges that failed to update the changelog here. As such, the log here should not be considered conclusive as to the changes that are arriving in 2.3.0.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,有几十次合并都没有更新这里的变更日志。因此,这里的日志不应该被认为是2.3.0版本变化的定论。

trans-unit.source: Possible segfaults from the C lib are gone.
trans-unit.target: C库中可能出现的 segfaults已经消失了。

trans-unit.source: Recipes
trans-unit.target: 食谱

trans-unit.source: Refactor
trans-unit.target: Refactor

trans-unit.source: Refactored ChildrenWatcher used by SetPartitioner into a publicly exposed PatientChildrenWatch under recipe.watchers.
trans-unit.target: 将SetPartitioner使用的ChildrenWatcher重构为recipe.watchers下公开的PatientChildrenWatch。

trans-unit.source: Refactored the internal connection handler to use a single thread. It now uses a deque and pipe to signal the ZK thread that there's a new command to send, so that the ZK thread can send it, or retrieve a response. Processing ZK requests and responses serially in a single thread eliminates the need for a bunch of the locking, the peekable queue and two threads working on the same underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 重构了内部连接处理程序,使其使用单一线程。现在,它使用deque和管道向ZK线程发出信号,表示有新的命令要发送,这样ZK线程就可以发送,或者检索响应。在单线程中串行处理ZK请求和响应,消除了一堆锁、可窥视队列和两个线程在同一底层socket上工作的需要。

trans-unit.source: Remove use of "async" as a variable (225d3369, closes #455)
trans-unit.target: 删除使用“异步”作为变量（225d3369，关闭＃455）

trans-unit.source: Removed the dependency on zope.interface. The classes in the interfaces module are left for documentation purposes only (issue #131).
trans-unit.target: 删除了对zope.interface的依赖。接口模块中的类仅为了文档目的而留下(问题#131)。

trans-unit.source: Respect large client timeout values when closing the connection.
trans-unit.target: 关闭连接时尊重大客户的超时值。

trans-unit.source: See the full docs for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见完整的文档。

trans-unit.source: Skipping a version to reflect the magnitude of the change. Kazoo is now a pure Python client with no C bindings. This release should run without a problem on alternate Python implementations such as PyPy and Jython. Porting to Python 3 in the future should also be much easier.
trans-unit.target: 跳过一个版本来反映变化的幅度。Kazoo 现在是一个纯粹的 Python 客户端,没有 C 绑定。这个版本在PyPy和Jython等其他Python实现上运行应该没有问题。将来移植到Python 3上也应该会容易得多。

trans-unit.source: Some low-level logging previously at the logging.INFO level is now logged at the logging.DEBUG level.
trans-unit.target: 以前在 logging.INFO 级别上的一些低级别日志记录现在在 logging.DEBUG 级别上记录。

trans-unit.source: Start running tests against Zookeeper 3.5.0 alpha and explicitly configure the admin.serverPort in tests to avoid port conflicts. The Zookeeper alpha version is not yet officially supported.
trans-unit.target: 开始运行Zookeeper 3.5.0 alpha的测试,并在测试中明确配置admin.serverPort以避免端口冲突。Zookeeper的alpha版本还没有正式支持。

trans-unit.source: State transition handling with listener registering to handle session state changes (choose to fatal the app on session expiration, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 通过监听器注册处理会话状态变化的状态转换处理(选择在会话到期时让应用死亡等)。

trans-unit.source: Substantial increase in logging data with debug mode. All correspondence with the Zookeeper server can now be seen to help in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 调试模式下,日志数据大幅增加。现在可以看到所有与Zookeeper服务器的对应关系,有助于调试。

trans-unit.source: Support additionaal lock contenter patterns (225eeecb)
trans-unit.target: 支持额外的锁内容满足者模式（225eeecb）

trans-unit.source: The KazooClient handler is now officially exposed as KazooClient.handler so that the appropriate sync objects can be used by end-users.
trans-unit.target: KazooClient处理程序现在正式以KazooClient.handler的形式暴露出来,这样终端用户就可以使用相应的同步对象。

trans-unit.source: The KazooClient.__init__ took as watcher argument as its second keyword argument. The argument had no effect anymore since version 0.5 and was removed.
trans-unit.target: KazooClient.__init__把watcher参数作为第二个关键字参数。自0.5版本以来,这个参数已经没有任何作用了,所以被删除了。

trans-unit.source: The data value argument for the create and create_async methods of the client was made optional and defaults to an empty byte string. The data value must be a byte string. Unicode values are no longer allowed and will raise a TypeError.
trans-unit.target: 客户端的create和create_async方法的数据值参数是可选的,默认为一个空的字节串。数据值必须是一个字节字符串。不再允许使用Unicode值,并且会引发TypeError。

trans-unit.source: The kazoo.handlers.util module was removed.
trans-unit.target: kazoo.handlers.util模块被删除。

trans-unit.source: The kazoo.testing.harness.KazooTestHarness class directly inherits from unittest.TestCase and you need to ensure to call its __init__ method.
trans-unit.target: kazoo.testing.harness.KazooTestHarness类直接继承自unittest.TestCase,你需要确保调用它的__init__方法。

trans-unit.source: The party recipes didn't set their participating flag to False after leaving.
trans-unit.target: 党的食谱在离开后并没有将自己的参与标志设置为False。

trans-unit.source: The testing helpers have been moved from testing.__init__ into a testing.harness module. The official API's of KazooTestCase and KazooTestHarness can still be directly imported from testing.
trans-unit.target: 测试助手已经从 testing.__init__移到 testing.harness 模块中。KazooTestCase和KazooTestHarness的官方API仍然可以直接从testing.__init__中导入。

trans-unit.source: This change may introduce new bugs, however there is no longer the possibility of a complete Python segfault due to errors in the C library and/or the C binding.
trans-unit.target: 这个变化可能会引入新的 bug,然而,由于 C 库和/或 C 绑定中的错误,不再有完整的 Python segfault 的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Unexpected exceptions break TreeCache (db0c2d4f)
trans-unit.target: 意外的异常破坏了TreeCache（db0c2d4f）

trans-unit.source: Unicode strings now work fine for node names and are properly converted to and from unicode objects.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字符串现在可以很好地用于节点名称,并且可以正确地转换为 unicode 对象和从 unicode 对象。

trans-unit.source: Unify queue factory in various handlers (cbd02f5c)
trans-unit.target: 在各种处理程序中统一队列工厂（cbd02f5c）

trans-unit.source: Use six to nicely handle the cross compatibility of kazoo with python 2.x and 3.x (reducing/removing the need to have custom compatibility code that replicates what six already provides).
trans-unit.target: 使用 six 可以很好地处理kazoo与python 2.x和3.x的交叉兼容性（减少/消除了具有复制六个已提供的自定义兼容性代码的需求）。

trans-unit.source: Use a copy of auth data when reconnecting (#509) (de20be91)
trans-unit.target: 重新连接时使用身份验证数据的副本（＃509）（de20be91）

trans-unit.source: Use strict regex to identify lock contenders. (cc8ce892)
trans-unit.target: 使用严格的正则表达式来标识锁竞争者。（cc8ce892）

trans-unit.source: When a retry operation ultimately fails, it now raises a kazoo.retry.RetryFailedError exception, instead of a general Exception instance. RetryFailedError also inherits from the base KazooException.
trans-unit.target: 当重试操作最终失败时,它现在会引发一个kazoo.retry.RetryFailedError异常,而不是一般的Exception实例。RetryFailedError也继承自基本的KazooException。

trans-unit.source: When authenticating via add_auth() the auth data will be saved to ensure that the authentication happens on reconnect (as is the case when feeding auth data via KazooClient's constructor). PR #172, patch by Raul Gutierrez S.
trans-unit.target: 当通过add_auth()进行验证时,验证数据将被保存,以确保验证在重新连接时发生(就像通过KazooClient的构造函数输入验证数据时一样)。PR #172,Raul Gutierrez S的补丁。

trans-unit.source: ZOOKEEPER-1318: SystemError is caught and rethrown as the proper invalid state exception in older zookeeper python bindings where this issue is still valid.
trans-unit.target: ZOOKEEPER-1318:在旧的zookeeper python绑定中,SystemError被捕获并作为适当的无效状态异常重抛,这个问题仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: ZOOKEEPER-1431: Install the latest zc-zookeeper-static library or use the packaged ubuntu one for ubuntu 12.04 or later.
trans-unit.target: ZOOKEEPER-1431:安装最新的zc-zookeeper-static库或使用ubuntu 12.04或更高版本的ubuntu打包库。

trans-unit.source: ZOOKEEPER-553: State handling isn't checked via this method, we track it in a simpler manner with the watcher to ensure we know the right state.
trans-unit.target: ZOOKEEPER-553:状态处理并不是通过这个方法来检查的,我们用更简单的方式用看板来跟踪它,以确保我们知道正确的状态。

trans-unit.source: Zookeeper logging stream redirected into Python logging channel under the name 'Zookeeper'.
trans-unit.target: Zookeeper日志流重定向到Python日志通道中,名称为 "Zookeeper"。

trans-unit.source: add Python 3.8 and remove Python 3.6 from the testing suite (#611) (e4f808f7)
trans-unit.target: 添加Python 3.8并从测试套件中删除Python 3.6（＃611）（e4f808f7）

trans-unit.source: add SASL DIGEST-MD5 support (aa2664b8)
trans-unit.target: 添加SASL DIGEST-MD5支持（aa2664b8）

trans-unit.source: add missed parens to LockingQueue function call. (88cf4aa7)
trans-unit.target: 将错过的括号添加到LockingQueue函数调用中。（88cf4aa7）

trans-unit.source: add travis deployment and update ZK versions (7d5d59cb, closes #436)
trans-unit.target: 添加travis部署并更新ZK版本（7d5d59cb，关闭＃436）

trans-unit.source: allow authentification in RO and RW modes (2320ab39)
trans-unit.target: 允许在RO和RW模式下进行身份验证（2320ab39）

trans-unit.source: allow having observers and different sized clusters
trans-unit.target: 允许拥有观察员和不同大小的集群

trans-unit.source: allow multiple endpoints in KazooClient hosts arg (72a8d96c, closes #411)
trans-unit.target: 允许KazooClient主机arg中有多个端点（72a8d96c，关闭＃411）

trans-unit.source: allow requests to be queued in CONNECTING state (#374) (#588) (a636d7a6)
trans-unit.target: 允许请求在CONNECTING状态（＃374）（＃588）（a636d7a6）中排队

trans-unit.source: capitalize the default_domain value (7fd22bfd)
trans-unit.target: 大写default_domain值（7fd22bfd）

trans-unit.source: change KazooRetry to uniformly jitter over the whole backoff interval (#521) (60366d2c)
trans-unit.target: 将KazooRetry更改为在整个退避间隔（＃521）均匀抖动（60366d2c）

trans-unit.source: closed states instead of lost states (#573) (961b2f3b)
trans-unit.target: 关闭状态而不是丢失状态（＃573）（961b2f3b）

trans-unit.source: conn hangs when TreeCache refreshing (11194137)
trans-unit.target: 当TreeCache刷新时conn挂起（11194137）

trans-unit.source: connect/connect_async has been renamed to start/start_async to better match the stop to indicate connection handling. The prior names are aliased for the time being.
trans-unit.target: connect/connect_async 已更名为 start/start_async,以便更好地配合停止来表示连接处理。之前的名字暂且别名。

trans-unit.source: deactivate TCP port that was enabled by default. (d7bed550)
trans-unit.target: 停用默认情况下启用的TCP端口。（d7bed550）

trans-unit.source: drop Python 2.6/3.3 official support, add 3.5/3.6 testing (2faba9ff, closes #441)
trans-unit.target: 放弃Python 2.6 / 3.3官方支持，添加3.5 / 3.6测试（2faba9ff，关闭＃441）

trans-unit.source: drop python 2.6 compatible gevent (2e8dcd38)
trans-unit.target: 删除python 2.6兼容的gevent（2e8dcd38）

trans-unit.source: ensure timeout argument is positive (#534) (8c5ce118)
trans-unit.target: 确保超时参数为正（＃534）（8c5ce118）

trans-unit.source: get_children with include_data=True uses GetChildren2 types (#514) (901cba7a)
trans-unit.target: 包含include_data = true的get_children使用GetChildren2类型（＃514）（901cba7a）

trans-unit.source: handle NameError with basestring on py3k.
trans-unit.target: 在py3k上用basetring处理NameError。

trans-unit.source: handle SSL_WANT_READ/WRITE errors (#619) (cbdc4749, closes #618)
trans-unit.target: 处理SSL_WANT_READ / WRITE错误（＃619）（cbdc4749，关闭＃618）

trans-unit.source: improve SASL interface (#546) (cd49b3fa)
trans-unit.target: 改善SASL界面（＃546）（cd49b3fa）

trans-unit.source: make badges link to travis and pypi (#528) (367a1df3)
trans-unit.target: 使徽章链接到travis和pypi（＃528）（367a1df3）

trans-unit.source: minor tweaks to contributing.md (#464) (5837d11b)
trans-unit.target: 对tributing.md（＃464）（5837d11b）进行细微调整

trans-unit.source: need gevent >= 1.2, not > 1.1 (18f3531b)
trans-unit.target: 需要gevent> = 1.2，而不是> 1.1（18f3531b）

trans-unit.source: pep8 all the things (92880342, closes #445)
trans-unit.target: pep8所有的东西（92880342，关闭＃445）

trans-unit.source: prefix with toxinidir variable with a / to ensure path to ensure-zookeeper-env.sh is correct (c4d42ca7)
trans-unit.target: 带有/的toxinidir变量的前缀，以确保确保确保zookeeper-env.sh的路径正确（c4d42ca7）

trans-unit.source: reduce timeout for the first Connect() request (#540) (2ae392e6)
trans-unit.target: 减少第一个Connect（）请求的超时（＃540）（2ae392e6）

trans-unit.source: remove easy_install instructions (6e6627d5)
trans-unit.target: 删除 easy_install 说明（6e6627d5）

trans-unit.source: remove broken downloads badge (47e07a96)
trans-unit.target: 删除损坏的下载徽章（47e07a96）

trans-unit.source: remove debian packaging (#468) (a28423aa)
trans-unit.target: 移除debian包装（＃468）（a28423aa）

trans-unit.source: remove python 3.3 from tox (cf66474b)
trans-unit.target: 从毒物中删除python 3.3（cf66474b）

trans-unit.source: resolve race in IAsyncResult.wait() (#487) (4d268adf)
trans-unit.target: 解决IAsyncResult.wait（）中的种族（＃487）（4d268adf）

trans-unit.source: run SASL Kerberos tests as part of build (5c461bdf)
trans-unit.target: 作为构建的一部分运行SASL Kerberos测试（5c461bdf）

trans-unit.source: specify -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 when starting the ZK JVM (5764da0b)
trans-unit.target: 在启动ZK JVM时指定-Dfile.encoding = UTF-8（5764da0b）

trans-unit.source: specify description type for pypi to render correctly (cc4006e6)
trans-unit.target: 指定pypi的描述类型以正确呈现（cc4006e6）

trans-unit.source: stop bundling virtualenv (af9b4cab)
trans-unit.target: 停止捆绑virtualenv（af9b4cab）

trans-unit.source: support deprecated KazooRetry argument (#545) (4242da80)
trans-unit.target: 支持不推荐使用的KazooRetry参数（＃545）（4242da80）

trans-unit.source: sync() return should be unchrooted (cbde70ac, closes #601)
trans-unit.target: sync（）return应该被取消限制（cbde70ac，关闭＃601）

trans-unit.source: update MANIFEST.in to reflect changes to filenames (c9a38c5d)
trans-unit.target: 更新MANIFEST.in以反映对文件名的更改（c9a38c5d）

trans-unit.source: update Zookeeper 3.5.2-alpha to 3.5.4-beta (30330915, closes #477)
trans-unit.target: 将Zookeeper 3.5.2-alpha更新为3.5.4-beta（30330915，关闭＃477）

trans-unit.source: update Zookeeper version from 3.4.10 to 3.4.13 (287749b4)
trans-unit.target: 将Zookeeper版本从3.4.10更新到3.4.13（287749b4）

trans-unit.source: use epoll when available to support fds > 1023 (267e61b4, closes #171)
trans-unit.target: 如果可用以支持fds> 1023（267e61b4，关闭编号171），请使用epoll

trans-unit.source: weaker crypto when configuring Kerberos (844df87a)
trans-unit.target: 配置Kerberos时较弱的加密（844df87a）

trans-unit.source: when connection fails, close the ConnectionHandler (#577) (#579) (c7e80503)
trans-unit.target: 连接失败时，关闭ConnectionHandler（＃577）（＃579）（c7e80503）
